aka: Pátio do Carrasco – The Damned Yard

cast.name: 安德烈·吉尔·马塔 André Gil Mata

awards:
第52届鹿特丹国际电影节(2023)
　　短片金虎奖 最佳短片(提名)

writer.name: 安德烈·吉尔·马塔 André Gil Mata
弗兰茨·卡夫卡 Franz Kafka

director.name: 安德烈·吉尔·马塔 André Gil Mata

trans_title: Pátio do Carrasco – The Damned Yard
introduction: In an ominous Lisbon courtyard where the last executioner of the kingdom once lived, an accident is waiting to happen. After a patient game of who's observing who, four characters will collide with dire consequences. Based on the short story A Fratricide by Franz Kafka, this is a masterclass in slow cinema, a pure 16mm cinematic pleasure by André Gil Mata.源自：https://iffr.com/en/iffr/2023/films/p%C3%A1tio-do-carrasco
